name: SaaS MVP
description: Launch your SaaS product from idea to production

phases.name: Phase 1: Foundation
phases.description: Set up infrastructure and core architecture

issues.title: Set up Next.js project with TypeScript
issues.body:
## Description
Initialize project with modern stack

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Next.js 15+ installed
- [ ] TypeScript configured
- [ ] ESLint and Prettier
- [ ] Git repository initialized

## Technical Notes
- App router preferred
- Strict TypeScript mode

issues.title: Configure database and ORM
issues.body:
## Description
Set up database with proper schema

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Database provider chosen
- [ ] ORM configured (Prisma/Drizzle)
- [ ] Initial schema created
- [ ] Migrations working

## Technical Notes
- Use PostgreSQL for production
- Seed data for development

issues.title: Implement authentication system
issues.body:
## Description
Set up user authentication

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Email/password auth
- [ ] OAuth providers (Google, GitHub)
- [ ] Session management
- [ ] Password reset flow

## Technical Notes
- Use NextAuth.js
- Secure session storage

issues.title: Create landing page
issues.body:
## Description
Build marketing landing page

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Hero section
- [ ] Feature highlights
- [ ] Pricing display
- [ ] CTA buttons
- [ ] Mobile responsive

## Technical Notes
- SEO optimized
- Fast loading time

issues.title: Build user dashboard
issues.body:
## Description
Create main user interface

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Dashboard layout
- [ ] Navigation menu
- [ ] User profile section
- [ ] Settings page

## Technical Notes
- Component library (shadcn/ui)
- Dark mode support

issues.title: Implement core product feature
issues.body:
## Description
Build the main value proposition feature

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Feature requirements met
- [ ] API endpoints created
- [ ] Frontend interface
- [ ] Real-time updates

## Technical Notes
- WebSocket if needed
- Optimistic UI updates

issues.title: Add payment integration
issues.body:
## Description
Integrate payment processing

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Stripe integration
- [ ] Subscription plans
- [ ] Payment methods
- [ ] Billing portal
- [ ] Webhooks configured

## Technical Notes
- PCI compliance
- Test mode for development

issues.title: Create API endpoints
issues.body:
## Description
Build RESTful API

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] CRUD operations
- [ ] Authentication middleware
- [ ] Error handling
- [ ] Rate limiting
- [ ] API documentation

## Technical Notes
- OpenAPI/Swagger docs
- Validation with Zod

issues.title: Set up monitoring and analytics
issues.body:
## Description
Implement observability

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Error tracking (Sentry)
- [ ] Analytics (PostHog/Mixpanel)
- [ ] Performance monitoring
- [ ] Uptime monitoring

## Technical Notes
- Privacy-compliant analytics
- Alert thresholds configured

issues.title: Write tests
issues.body:
## Description
Comprehensive test coverage

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Unit tests
- [ ] Integration tests
- [ ] E2E tests
- [ ] 80%+ coverage

## Technical Notes
- Jest + React Testing Library
- Playwright for E2E

issues.title: Deploy to production
issues.body:
## Description
Launch the application

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Production environment
- [ ] CI/CD pipeline
- [ ] Domain configured
- [ ] SSL certificates
- [ ] Backup system

## Technical Notes
- Vercel recommended
- Database backups automated
